author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Laura Ashley Holdings ‍Says Pre-Tax Profit For Year Will Fall Below Market Expectations​
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Laura Ashley Holdings Plc:
* H1 PRETAX PROFIT 4.3 MILLION STG VERSUS 7.8 MILLION STG YEAR AGO
* H1 PRETAX PROFIT 4.3 MILLION STG VERSUS 7.8 MILLION STG YEAR AGO
* H1 SALES FELL 7.7 PERCENT TO 134.7 MILLION STG * H1 ‍TOTAL LIKE-FOR-LIKE RETAIL SALES DOWN 0.5%​
* ‍BOARD IS NOT RECOMMENDING PAYMENT OF AN INTERIM DIVIDEND (26 WEEKS TO 31 DECEMBER 2016: 0.5PENCE)​
* ‍PRE-TAX PROFIT FOR YEAR WILL FALL BELOW MARKET EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
